channel.title: Most onions timing out before loading on Whonix v 16
channel.description: Almost every onion page being loaded is timing out or receiving notification that the site may be down. Also getting a notice on pages that do load that https is unavailable and/or there may be an attacker between me and the page. Is there a way to fix this as my whonix is basically unusable.
